content: HIT-HY 100 Adhesive anchor High-performance injectable hybrid mortar for anchoring in concrete and for rebar connections ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Chemical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Suitable for use in cracked and uncracked concrete with all anchor rods and rebar according to ICC-ES approval (International Code Council - Evaluation Service) Automatic hole cleaning with TE-CD and TE-YD drill bits in combination with Hilti vacuum cleaners Extensive range of accessories available (e.g. piston plugs for rebar injection, cordless electric dispenser) IAPMO masonry approval and technical data available for higher application flexibility Applications Anchoring light structural steel connections (e.g. steel columns, beams) Anchoring secondary steel elements Rebar doweling / connection of secondary post-installed rebars Renovation / upgrades with post-installed rebars Substitution of misplaced / missing rebars For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU) Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete) IBC compliance: IBC 2015, IBC 2018 Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU) | Base material condition (as per approval) | Dry, Wet | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete) | IBC compliance | IBC 2015, IBC 2018 | Seismic loading | Yes | Fatigue loading | No | Fire resistance | No | PROFIS Software | Yes | Anchoring elements | HAS threaded rods, HIT-V threaded rods, Rebar | Cleaning procedures | Automatic Cleaning (SafeSet Hollow Drill Bit), Compressed-Air Cleaning, Manual Cleaning | Storage and transportation temperature range | 41 - 77 °F | In-service temperature – range | -40 - 176 °F | Free of styrene | Yes | Type of fixing (global) | Through-fastening, Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 2078494 - Adh anchor HY 100 11.1oz/330ml - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Foil pack - 1x Mixer - 1x Mixer extension - 3937857 - HY-100 (330ml) 10 tubes + HDM - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDM 500 Dispenser assy - 10x Foil pack - 10x Mixer - 10x Mixer extension - 1x 500ml Cassette black - 3510989 - Adh anchor HY 100 11.1oz/330ml 1MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 25x Foil pack - 25x Mixer - 25x Mixer extension - 3510990 - Adh anc HY 100 11.1oz/330ml 1MC + bl cartr - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 25x Foil pack - 25x Mixer - 25x Mixer extension - 1x 500ml Cassette black - 3785765 - HY100 11.1OZ/330ML (1MC)+HDE 22V Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDE 500-22 HNA Cordl. dispenser assy - 1x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 25x Foil pack - 25x Mixer - 25x Mixer extension - 1x 500ml Cassette black - 1x B 22-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 3962957 -
